thread.title: Vaibhavi Merchant takes a dig at Filmfare for nominating Salman Khan in the Best Choreographer category!
thread.title_full: Vaibhavi Merchant takes a dig at Filmfare for nominating Salman Khan in the Best Choreographer category!

author: Apoorva Nijhara
title: Vaibhavi Merchant takes a dig at Filmfare for nominating Salman Khan in the Best Choreographer category!
text:
January 23, 2017 Apoorva Nijhara 33787 reads 7 comments 
Filmfare Awards have been termed as Unfair Awards and it created ripples all over the news when Akshay Kumar wasn't nominated for Airlift and Rustom. The awards show also made Harshvardhan Kapoor go berserk after Diljit Dosanjh won an award for Best Debutante. Well, now it has upset choreographer Vaibhavi Merchant who lashed out at the institution in a sarcastic way for nominating Salman Khan as the Best Choreographer for J ag Ghoomeya instead of giving credits to her. She wrote, "Why not nominate me as best actor for Sultan if you cud nominate my dearest Salman for best choreographer Jag ." What do you have to say about it? Why not nominate me as best actor for Sultan if you cud nominate my dearest Salman for best choreographer Jag ghumeya.. @filmfare pic.twitter.com/K4BtwqxbOH
